name: RBC Brooklyn Half Course Preview Run
description: Join us for a preview run of the Brooklyn Half Marathon course. Experience the route and prepare for race day.
chineseDescription: 加入我们的布鲁克林半程马拉松探路跑。体验赛道并为比赛日做好准备。

name: Summer Bear Mountain Run
description: Challenge yourself with our scenic trail run at Bear Mountain. Perfect for building endurance and enjoying nature.
chineseDescription: 在熊山参加我们的风景优美的越野跑。这是提高耐力和享受自然的完美选择。

name: Seven Bridge Run
description: Experience the iconic Seven Bridge Run through Manhattan. A unique urban running experience.
chineseDescription: 体验标志性的曼哈顿七桥跑。独特的城市跑步体验。

name: Central Park Speed Workout
description: Join us for an intense interval training session to improve your speed and endurance.
chineseDescription: 加入我们的高强度间歇训练课程，提高您的速度和耐力。

name: NYC Marathon Training Run
description: Long training run for NYC Marathon participants. Build your endurance and prepare for the big race.
chineseDescription: 纽约马拉松参赛者的长距离训练跑。提高耐力，为大赛做准备。

name: Boardwalk Kids Run
description: Give the young athletes in your life a chance to join in on the race-day fun in Coney Island.
chineseDescription: 让您生活中的年轻运动员有机会在康尼岛体验比赛日的乐趣。

name: Brooklyn Half Marathon
description: Join thousands of runners in the iconic Brooklyn Half Marathon. Experience the vibrant neighborhoods and finish with a spectacular view of Coney Island.
chineseDescription: 加入数千名跑者参加标志性的布鲁克林半程马拉松。体验充满活力的社区，并在康尼岛的美景中完成比赛。

name: NewBee 9th Anniversary Run
description: Celebrate NewBee Running Club's 9th anniversary with a special evening run. Join us for a memorable event with fellow runners and special surprises.
chineseDescription: 参加新蜂跑团九周年特别夜跑活动。与跑友们一起参加这个难忘的活动，还有特别惊喜等着您。

name: Global Running Day Celebration
description: Join runners worldwide in celebrating Global Running Day. Participate in group runs
column12: 加入全球跑者庆祝全球跑步日。参加团体跑、工作坊和社区活动。

name: Queens 10K Challenge
chineseDescription: featuring a scenic route through Flushing Meadows Corona Park and surrounding neighborhoods.
status: 在皇后区10公里挑战赛中挑战自我，路线将穿过法拉盛草地公园和周边社区。
